thread.title: Yond Nallas

author: Yond Nallas
title: Yond Nallas
text: Found a game at an incredible 92% discount that I wanted on this site and wondered if it was genuine. After making an initial purchase and finding it was completely legitimate, I went on and purchased an additional 2 copies for friends which also worked without issue. The site is now a concrete addition to my favourite bookmarks and shall certainly be seeing a lot more of my business in future.
